message:
从一个网页上复制了一个SQL指令到phpMyAdmin里。
use mysql;
select host,user from user;

然后就炸了。

restart也不行，一分钟以后继续炸，循环restart循环炸……

这是/var/log/mysqld.log

160115 18:13:15 mysqld_safe Starting mysqld daemon with databases from /var/lib/mysql
160115 18:13:15 [Note] libgovernor.so not found
160115 18:13:15 [Note] /usr/libexec/mysqld (mysqld 5.5.46-cll-lve) starting as process 26575 ...

160115 18:13:15 InnoDB: Initializing buffer pool, size = 128.0M
160115 18:13:15 InnoDB: Completed initialization of buffer pool

InnoDB: The log sequence number in ibdata files does not match

Version: '5.5.46-cll-lve'  socket: '/var/lib/mysql/mysql.sock'  port: 3306  MySQL Community Server (GPL) by Atomicorp

title: 【解决】求救，数据库莫名其妙的炸了
